changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.comment: The rollback tag is absent in this changeset because in the event of a failed truncation, timeseries data will still be in place and the next changeset (add forecast column to the non-display group table) will fail and rollback if required.
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW', 'U') IS NOT NULL TRUNCATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.NON_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW
